commit.message:
Improve xml index expr type checking

Emit warning when deprecated child access is used.
Emit error when non int/string index is used.

nodes.bodyText:
How about

  
    
      
        Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
              xml child access using index expression is deprecated and will be removed in next minor release, please \
          
          
            
              use xml step expressions
          
          
            
              xml child access using member access is deprecated and will be removed in the next minor release. xml \
          
          
            
              step expressions can now be used to access children.
